column5: And it's the only part of the river...........   Frozen.  Mother Nature can be so cruel!  Sucked it up and headed out with the crowds, got one decent hen right away.  Took off after a brazen fellow came with-in 10 inches of my bait to see what I was using... I told him it was a "Handlebarz" lure.  You should get an email soon Mike P.
How deep?  Should have busted it up if you had waders and made your own run    Can't be all that thick!
Been there done that Bill... took the cinder block and rope out of the truck earlier this spring.  It's about 6-7 ft there... and I already had a bath.
LOL!!!!  At least an attempt was made
Yup, Mother Nature can be cruel  But you got out there, that's better than sitting behind a desk
thats how the ganny was last weekend, i spent about an hour breaking up a drift close to shore, then when i sat down for a bit to catch my breath, some random guy starts fishing it

LOL thanks for the plug I will be more then happy to sell this fella a few of the Hen catchers. If I get that email I will let be sure to hook him up.  Congratz on getting out fishing that had to be way better then working all day
